Conference and journal list about anomaly detection and reconfigurable computing

Inspired Ideas for 2017

Posted by yongfuhe on June 24, 2017

In this blogpost, I introduce some conferences and journals that are related to anomaly detection and reconfigurable computing.

Feel free to follow if you'd be interested in reading more in the future and thanks for all the feedback!

Part 1: Anomaly detection

If you were interested in anomaly detection. The following conferences should not be missed.

ICLR

ICLR 2017 (International Conference on Learning Representations 2017)

Top conference on Deep Learning.

IJCAI

IJCAI 2017 (International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence 2017)

Top conference on Artificial Intelligence.

KDD

KDD 2017 (ACM SIGKDD Conference of Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining 2017)

Top conference on data science, data mining, knowledge discovery, large-scale data analytics, and big data.

ICDM

ICDM 2017 (International Conference on Data Mining 2017)

Top conference on data mining.

SIAM

SIAM 2017 (SIAM International Conference on Data Mining 2017)

Top conference on data mining.

ICML

ICML 2017 (International Conference on Machine Learning 2017)

Top conference on machine Learning.

ICRA

ICRA 2017 (International Conference on Robotics and Automation )

Top conference on robotics and automation

Part 2: Reconfigurable computing

If you were interested in reconfigurable computing. The following conferences should not be missed.

ASPLOS

ASPLOS 2017 (International Conference on Architectural Support for Programming Languages and Operating Systems 2017)

Top conference on computer architecture and hardware, programming languages and compilers, operating systems and networking, as well as applications and user interfaces.

ISCA

ISCA 2017 (International Symposium on Computer Architecture 2017)

Top conference on computer architecture.

FPGA

FPGA 2017 (International Symposium on Field-Programmable Gate Arrays 2017)

Top conference on FPGA.

FCCM

FCCM 2017 (International Symposium on Field-Programmable Custom Computing Machines 2017)

Top conference on exploiting the unique features and capabilities of FPGAs and other reconfigurable hardware.

FPL

FPL 2017 ( International Conference on Field-Programmable Technology 2017)

Top conference on field programmable technologies and applications.

FPT

FPT 2017 ( International Conference on Field-Programmable Logic and Applications 2017)

Top conference on field programmable technologies and applications.
